sub_title: Carving a new path in healthcare ✨ Nurse in training
summary: After more than a decade in different industries across the commercial field, both in Chile and overseas, I am in search of a new path. As of January 2023 I am transitioning towards a new career and a new profession in the healthcare sector of the Netherlands. From a place where science and humanitarian aid converge, I wish to be able to contribute further with my work and knowledge in caring for the physical and mental well-being of fellow human beings in the years to come. You are invited to join and to follow me in this new journey!

projects.title: Building a roadmap for the future of the RDW's Test Center
projects.description: The RDW faces the challenge of re-locating their current Test Center based in Lelystad. In line with the current developments in the automotive industry, mostly ignited by the rise of automation and driver-less technologies, the RDW has projected the construction of a New Test Center which can cater also for the testing of all these new technologies and attract new partners and customers, given the new business opportunities that are available. The research starts with an understanding of the current situation of the existing Test Center via a detailed 360-degree assessment. This is followed by a gap analysis, considering the situation today versus the envisioned future. Once the gap is described, a roadmap with recommendations towards the desired outcome is designed and proposed.

projects.title: ViperView
projects.description: Lockheed Martin and ILIAS Solutions executed a joint R&D project to assess the collection and presentation of customer data for their global F-16 fleet. ViperView can integrate with existing F-16 user systems to present data for analysis, recommendations and managerial decisions to reduce F-16 customer's operational and sustainment costs. As a Project Officer, I ensured the project's communication and flow of information between all the involved parties at different locations, followed-up the accomplishment of milestones in a timely manner, made sure that issues were escalated as needed, and managed the complete project's back office, including the administration of the consultants' timesheets, costs and expenses.

projects.title: Integrated Marketing Communications for the Hermitage Museum of Amsterdam
projects.description: Developed a new Integrated Marketing Communications strategy for the Hermitage Museum of Amsterdam based on information technologies and innovation, with the purpose of increasing the number of visitors and therefore its market share in the Dutch museum industry. The proposal was presented in June 2015 to the Sales & Marketing team of the Hermitage Amsterdam.

projects.title: International Expansion Strategy for Backsberg Estate Cellars
projects.description: As part of the international module of the Nyenrode MBA program at the University of Stellenbosch Business School in South Africa, we developed an international expansion strategy for Backsberg, a winery located in Paarl, near Cape Town. The strategic plan includes an overview of the world wine industry, a reflection on the Chilean experience as a case study of success, the suggested expansion route into international markets with focus on a specific region, and a re-branding proposition.

projects.title: Re-thinking the Erasmus Centre for Strategic Philanthropy
projects.description: Developed a strategic plan to refresh the operating model of the Erasmus Centre for Strategic Philanthropy (ECSP), reshaping its positioning and re-thinking its revenue streams, so to increase the awareness and social footprint of the centre amongst the philanthropic community. The plan was presented to the Executive Director of the ECSP in March 2015.

projects.title: Red Cross Global Dialogue on Emerging Technologies for Emerging Needs
projects.description: In the context of a Business Plan Challenge organized by the American Red Cross, the Netherlands Rode Kruis and the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies on the use of emerging technologies to strengthen urban disaster resilience, we developed a business plan for the use of 3D printing. The business plan defines the technology and the use case, providing a strategy for making 3D printing accessible, easily implementable, readily available and highly useful for communities, in the alleviation of basic human needs during emergency situations.

profile_positions.description: During my education leading to the degree of Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Nursing at the HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht), I am working as an Apprentice Nurse at the department of psychogeriatrics of Careyn's Snavelenburg elderly care center.
profile_positions.title: Leerling HBO Verpleegkundige intramuraal (Apprentice Nurse)

profile_positions.description: The Healthcare and Social Care Orientation Program is aimed at providing participants with a thorough guidance towards a new profession in the Dutch healthcare and social care sector. With a combination of (guest) lectures by various professionals and experts from different branches, study & career coaching and practical experience, the program is a cooperation initiative between 24 different regional healthcare institutions within the Amsterdam metropolitan area and (amongst other partners) IN Amsterdam, ROC van Amsterdam, Hogeschool van Amsterdam, Amsterdam Economic Board and the Regional Work Center for Greater Amsterdam.
profile_positions.title: Participant Healthcare and Social Care Orientation Program

profile_positions.description: UNGA is a global creative agency that designs and produces short-term loyalty programs for (grocery) retailers in over 35 countries. These programs are a result of playful and educational concepts which, through carriers such as toys, games and other collectible premiums, help families and businesses grow through the power of play. As Senior Account Manager, I led various multi-disciplinary project teams and the entire sales process to multiple global accounts in different world regions such as the EU, Latin America, Africa, and the Middle East, from market research and ideation to pitch, adaptation, commercial negotiations, project execution and evaluation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager

profile_positions.description: RDW is the Netherlands Vehicle Authority, contributing to making road transport in the Netherlands as safe, clean, economically viable and well-regulated as possible. I advised the department of Vehicle Regulation & Admission in topics related to Intelligent Transport Systems, Smart Mobility and Innovation, in the form of a consultancy project providing a public sector organisation with a commercial perspective, in order to drive their business with a customer-oriented approach, using the RDW's Test Center and its future relocation/expansion as a case of study. I was also an active member of the joint working groups for the development of the ISO standard in Vehicle Cybersecurity, in collaboration with SAE International.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Advisor

profile_positions.description: ILIAS Solutions develops software for fleet management. As Implementation Consultant, I was project officer for implementation projects at key customers, assisting also in the strategic planning and implementation methodologies, change management support, prospecting of new potential customers and opportunities, preparing sales presentations and performing pre-sales activities. I also managed the company’s Salesforce platform and elaborated several working packages for project bidding processes.
profile_positions.title: Implementation Consultant

profile_positions.description: MBA internship as graduation requirement from Nyenrode Business Universiteit. Researcher and Project Consultant, developing Final Project (Thesis) titled "Social Entrepreneurship Ecosystem Building and Upscaling of the Social Impact Factory: The Social Impact Factory in Utrecht as a Case Study". The research was aimed at understanding how a business ecosystem in the domain of social entrepreneurship is built and how such a construction can be scaled up and exported further as a service for interested parties.
profile_positions.title: MBA Intern

profile_positions.description: National Key Account Manager for Empresas SB, within the Pharmacies & Perfumeries distribution channel of Chile. Empresas SB is the 2nd largest holding in the Chilean Pharmacies & Perfumeries retail market, operating nation-wide through the pharmacy banner Salcobrand and the perfumery banner Pre Unic.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager Pharmacy & Perfumery Retail

profile_positions.description: National Key Account Manager for Cencosud, within the Grocery Retail distribution channel of Chile. Cencosud is the 2nd largest holding in the Chilean Grocery Retail market, operating nation-wide through the high-end banner Jumbo and the middle-low-end banner Santa Isabel. The holding also operates internationally through several other hyper and supermarket banners in Argentina, Peru, Brazil and Colombia. As a global account, I also assisted the International KAM in the implementation of the regional commercial agreement, in coordination with the other Beiersdorf KAMs for Cencosud within the Latin America business unit.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager Grocery Retail

profile_positions.description: Regional Key Account (POS/field) Supervisor for the Grocery Retail distribution channel in the metropolitan region of Santiago, Chile. This distribution channel in Santiago is composed of more than 500 hyper and supermarket stores of different banners owned mainly by three retailer holdings: Walmart Chile, Cencosud and SMU.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Supervisor

profile_positions.description: Yogurtlife is a chain of frozen yogurt parlors. As an associate store manager, I was responsible for the general management of one of the stores: dealing with purchase orders to suppliers to assure stock availability of products, coordinating the employee's shifts schedule, cash settlement, book-keeping, customer service and maintaining the well-functioning of the shop in general.
profile_positions.title: Associate Store Manager

profile_positions.description: The Merchant is a family business which trades and commercializes beers, wines, spirits and other imported consumer goods in Chile. As a (part-time) freelancer during my studies, I assisted in the exhibition and promotion of such products in several related food&beverage expos and fairs. Additionally, I managed an independent portfolio of direct customers.
profile_positions.title: Freelancer

profile_positions.description: Professional internship as graduation requirement from Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile. I assisted the Brand Manager for NIVEA Body and NIVEA Deodorant in the planning and launch of marketing campaigns and budget control, conducted the daily communication with the creative agency developing POS merchandising, and participated in the planning process of promotional packs with internal stakeholders and external suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

volunteer_experiences.description: Proyecta UC is a student organization within the Pontifical Catholic University of Chile, providing both emergency construction solutions and social empowerment of rural communities in Chile. As a volunteer, I was part of the Workshops Committee, coordinating the different workshops for adults and children, such as dental hygiene, first aid, legal advice and basic personal finances.

Peer Group Coaching is an essential part of both the MSc in Management and the International MBA programs at Nyenrode Business Universiteit, in which students develop their leadership skills by coaching each other in issues related to their studies, personal work or something they find challenging. As a member of the Nyenrode Alumni community, I facilitate these sessions for a group of 6 students of 3 different nationalities.

A Neighborhood Ambassador for the Municipality of Utrecht is a volunteer who takes care of their neighborhood in various ways and proposes initiatives to the City Hall to make their neighborhood a better place to live for the whole community.
Amongst others, some of the tasks of a Neighborhood Ambassador include trash picking from public spaces, clearing blockages of public garbage containers when needed, sweeping, taking care of public gardens, etc.
